title.rendered: Special Art & Crafts session for Smile Kids

content.rendered: Children from Smile Foundation’s Mission Education centre IPER in Kolkata brought out their creativity as a Special Art & Crafts session was held for them. With an aim to provide an outlet for their talent and create bonding between all the kids. The session was enjoyed by the children as well as the teachers and volunteers, who guided them throughout.
